original_title: Las cinco vidas de María Rodríguez
overview: Built around the most popular name in the country, the documentary narrates the stories of five women who have the same name, but who are very different from each other, portrayed in their own daily life scenarios, as dissimilar as their professions, views and situations in life, bringing us closer to the reality faced by Costa Rican women today.
title: Las cinco vidas de María Rodríguez
